name: Buffalo Chicken Sliders

ingredients.name: mini slider buns, split and toasted

preparation: In a bowl, lightly beat egg.
Add ground chicken and seasoning. Combine and form mixture into eight slider patties.
Grill over medium-high heat with lid closed for 2–3 min each side, or until an instant-read thermometer indicates a Food Safe internal temperature of 165° F.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl, make dressing recipe by combining dressing mix, mayo, lemon juice, olive oil, milk, garlic, and hot sauce.
Place romaine and carrots on bottom halves of buns; top with patties. Spoon half prepared dressing on top; cover with top bun halves.
tips: Customize as you like. Swap ground chicken for turkey, beef, or firm tofu.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup your favorite veggies: make carrot and pepper sticks for dunking in dressing.

products.name: Caesar Dressing Mix
summary: This dressing is a little bit of magic: It’s rich, creamy, full of flavour, and it has zero sodium! Take it far beyond Caesar salad and use it as a sauce for pizza, a dip for veggies, chicken fingers, and zucchini fries, or mix it in your white pasta sauce. Simply mix the blend with mayo or Greek yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, and milk, and it’s ready for anything!
